alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 2:52PM EDT until March 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... East central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 152 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Vernon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Ebro, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Fountain, Singer Road, Camps Head, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Youngstown, Porter Lake, Betts, Red Oak, Chason, Saunders, Greenhead, Red Head and Center Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
